text: [Static Town, Territory of Static]
Everyone, I have talked with the king and he has provided us a ship.
We will set sail as soon as everyone is ready.
[Static Town Port, Territory of Static]
Hello, are you Proton Xurr?
I am.
I am Fael Illyure of the Elemental Offense Squad.
And I am Erif Blaze of the Elemental Offense Squad.

speaker: right
text: We have been assigned to assist you on your voyage to the Nolavillian Continent.

speaker: right
text: However, due to another assignment going on, only one of us can help you.
[Q] Recruit Fael [W] Recruit Erif [E] Don't recruit either

speaker: right
text: Bruh.
DID SOMEBODY SAY "BRUH"!?
Bruh-huh!
I am the great Vruh E. Momen LXIX!

speaker: right
text: I search the world for epic "Bruh Moments", and your sir... have just said "Bruh"!

speaker: right
text: Such wholesomeness! Such gaming!

speaker: right
text: Such... D R I P

speaker: right
text: This is truly poggers!

speaker: right
text: Oh what an adventure this will be!
[Q] You're hired [W] We never recruited you

speaker: right
text: Oh, so that's how it is...

speaker: right
text: You shall repent in the fires of the Xuir Wrath for all of eternity, with no hope of ever escaping to freedom, for you have disturbed the way of the Bruh.

speaker: right
text: I wait for the day in which I may witness your untimely gameend so in which I could perform the dance of the defaults upon your soulless husk of a body.

speaker: right
text: /s
